56 : SurfaceKernel(communicator, haloSize, true)
57#else

62 : SurfaceKernel(true)

138SurfUnstructured::SurfUnstructured(std::istream &stream, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize)
139 : SurfaceKernel(communicator, haloSize, false)
140#else
146SurfUnstructured::SurfUnstructured(std::istream &stream)
147 : SurfaceKernel(false)
148#endif
149{
150 // Restore the patch
151 restore(stream);
152}

159std::unique_ptr<PatchKernel> SurfUnstructured::clone() const
160{
161 return std::unique_ptr<SurfUnstructured>(new SurfUnstructured(*this));
162}

195void SurfUnstructured::_dump(std::ostream &stream) const
196{
197 // Save the vertices
198 dumpVertices(stream);
199
200 // Save the cells
201 dumpCells(stream);
202
203 // Save the interfaces
204 dumpInterfaces(stream);
205}
206
212void SurfUnstructured::_restore(std::istream &stream)
213{
214 // Restore the vertices
215 restoreVertices(stream);
216
217 // Restore the cells
218 restoreCells(stream);
219
220 // Restore the interfaces
221 restoreInterfaces(stream);
222}

237long SurfUnstructured::locatePoint(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
238{
239 BITPIT_UNUSED(point);
240
241 throw std::runtime_error ("The function 'locatePoint' is not implemented yet");
242
243 return Cell::NULL_ID;
244}
245
246//TODO: Aggiungere un metodo in SurfUnstructured per aggiungere più vertici.
254void SurfUnstructured::extractEdgeNetwork(LineUnstructured &net)
255{
256 // ====================================================================== //
257 // VARIABLES DECLARATION //
258 // ====================================================================== //
259
260 // Local variables
261 bool check;
262 int n_faces, n_adj;
263 long id;
264 const long *adjacencies;
265
266 // Counters
267 int i, j;
268 VertexIterator v_, ve_ = vertexEnd();
269 CellIterator c_, ce_ = cellEnd();
270
271 // ====================================================================== //
272 // INITIALIZE DATA STRUCTURE //
273 // ====================================================================== //
274 net.reserveCells(net.getCellCount() + countFaces());
275 net.reserveVertices(net.getVertexCount() + getVertexCount());
276
277 // ====================================================================== //
278 // ADD VERTEX TO net //
279 // ====================================================================== //
280 for (v_ = vertexBegin(); v_ != ve_; ++v_) {
281 net.addVertex(v_->getCoords(), v_->getId());
282 } //next v_
283
284 // ====================================================================== //
285 // ADD EDGES //
286 // ====================================================================== //
287 for (c_ = cellBegin(); c_ != ce_; ++c_) {
288 id = c_->getId();
289 n_faces = c_->getFaceCount();
290 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = c_->getVertexIds();
291 for (i = 0; i < n_faces; ++i) {
292 check = true;
293 n_adj = c_->getAdjacencyCount(i);
294 adjacencies = c_->getAdjacencies(i);
295 for (j = 0; j < n_adj; ++j) {
296 check = check && (id > adjacencies[j]);
297 } //next j
298 if (check) {
299 // Get edge type
300 ElementType edgeType = c_->getFaceType(i);
301
302 // Get edge connect
303 ConstProxyVector<long> faceConnect = c_->getFaceConnect(i);
304 int faceConnectSize = faceConnect.size();
305
306 std::unique_ptr<long[]> edgeConnect = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[faceConnectSize]);
307 for (int k = 0; k < faceConnectSize; ++k) {
308 edgeConnect[k] = faceConnect[k];
309 }
310
311 // Add edge
312 net.addCell(edgeType, std::move(edgeConnect));
313 }
314 } //next i
315 } //next c_
316
317 return;
318}

343int SurfUnstructured::importSTL(const std::string &filename,
344 int PIDOffset, bool PIDSquash)
345{
346 return importSTL(filename, STLReader::FormatUnknown, false, PIDOffset, PIDSquash);
347}

372int SurfUnstructured::importSTL(const std::string &filename, bool isBinary,
373 int PIDOffset, bool PIDSquash,
374 std::unordered_map<int, std::string> *PIDNames)
375{
376 STLReader::Format format;
377 if (isBinary) {
378 format = STLReader::FormatBinary;
379 } else {
380 format = STLReader::FormatASCII;
381 }
382
383 return importSTL(filename, format, false, PIDOffset, PIDSquash, PIDNames);
384}
385
419int SurfUnstructured::importSTL(const std::string &filename, STLReader::Format format,
420 bool joinFacets, int PIDOffset, bool PIDSquash,
421 std::unordered_map<int, std::string> *PIDNames)
422{
423 int readerError;
424
425 // Initialize reader
426 STLReader reader(filename, format);
427 if (format == STLReader::FormatUnknown) {
428 format = reader.getFormat();
429 }
430
431 // Begin reding the STL file
432 readerError = reader.readBegin();
433 if (readerError != 0) {
434 return readerError;
435 }
436
437 // Initialize cache needed for joinin the facets
438 //
439 // The cache will contain the ids of the vertices that have been added
440 // to the patch. It uses a special comparator that allows to compare
441 // the coordinates of a candidate vertex with the coordinates of the
442 // vertices in the cache.
443 std::array<double, 3> *candidateVertexCoords;
444 Vertex::Less vertexLess(10 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
445
446 auto vertexCoordsLess = [this, &vertexLess, &candidateVertexCoords](const long &id_1, const long &id_2)
447 {
448 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_1 = (id_1 >= 0) ? this->getVertex(id_1).getCoords() : *candidateVertexCoords;
449 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_2 = (id_2 >= 0) ? this->getVertex(id_2).getCoords() : *candidateVertexCoords;
450
451 return vertexLess(coords_1, coords_2);
452 };
453
454 std::set<long, decltype(vertexCoordsLess)> vertexCache(vertexCoordsLess);
455
456 // Read all the solids in the STL file
457 int pid = PIDOffset;
458
459 ElementType facetType = ElementType::TRIANGLE;
460 const int nFacetVertices = ReferenceElementInfo::getInfo(ElementType::TRIANGLE).nVertices;
461
462 while (true) {
463 // Read header
464 std::size_t nFacets;
465 std::string name;
466 readerError = reader.readHeader(&name, &nFacets);
467 if (readerError != 0) {
468 if (readerError == -2) {
469 break;
470 } else {
471 return readerError;
472 }
473 }
474
475 // Generate patch cells from STL facets
476 reserveCells(getCellCount() + nFacets);
477
478 std::size_t nEstimatedVertices;
479 if (joinFacets) {
480 // The number of facets and the number of vertices of a triangulation
481 // are related by the inequality nFacets <= 2 * nVertices - 4, where
482 // the equality holds for a closed triangulation. To limit memory usage
483 // we estimate the number of vertices assuming a closed triangulation
484 // (this gives us the minimum number of nodes the triangulation could
485 // possibly have).
486 nEstimatedVertices = static_cast<std::size_t>(0.5 * nFacets) + 2;
487 } else {
488 nEstimatedVertices = nFacetVertices * nFacets;
489 }
490 reserveVertices(getVertexCount() + nEstimatedVertices);
491
492 vertexCache.clear();
493
494 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nFacets; ++n) {
495 // Read facet data
496 std::array<Vertex, 3> faceVertices;
497 std::array<double, 3> facetNormal;
498 readerError = reader.readFacet(&(faceVertices[0].getCoords()), &(faceVertices[1].getCoords()), &(faceVertices[2].getCoords()), &facetNormal);
499 if (readerError != 0) {
500 return readerError;
501 }
502
503 // Add vertices
504 std::unique_ptr<long[]> connectStorage = std::unique_ptr<long[]>(new long[nFacetVertices]);
505 if (joinFacets) {
506 for (int i = 0; i < nFacetVertices; ++i) {
507 // The candidate vertex is set equal to the face vertex
508 // that needs to be added, then the cache is checked: if
509 // a vertex with the same coordinates is already in the
510 // cache, the vertex will not be added and the existing
511 // one will be used.
512 //
513 // The cache contains the ids of the vertices that have
514 // been added. It uses a special comparator that allows
515 // to compare the candidate vertex with the ones in the
516 // cache, in order to do that the null vertex should be
517 // passed to the find function.
518 candidateVertexCoords = &(faceVertices[i].getCoords());
519
520 long vertexId;
521 auto vertexCacheItr = vertexCache.find(Vertex::NULL_ID);
522 if (vertexCacheItr == vertexCache.end()) {
523 VertexIterator vertexItr = addVertex(*candidateVertexCoords);
524 vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
525 vertexCache.insert(vertexId);
526 } else {
527 vertexId = *vertexCacheItr;
528 }
529 connectStorage[i] = vertexId;
530 }
531 } else {
532 for (int i = 0; i < nFacetVertices; ++i) {
533 VertexIterator vertexItr = addVertex(faceVertices[i].getCoords());
534 long vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
535 connectStorage[i] = vertexId;
536 }
537 }
538
539 // Add cell
540 CellIterator cellIterator = addCell(facetType, std::move(connectStorage));
541 cellIterator->setPID(pid);
542 }
543
544 // Read footer
545 readerError = reader.readFooter(name);
546 if (readerError != 0) {
547 return readerError;
548 }
549
550 // Assign PID name
551 if (!PIDSquash) {
552 if (PIDNames && !name.empty()) {
553 PIDNames->insert({{pid, name}});
554 }
555 ++pid;
556 }
557
558 // Multi-body STL files are supported only in ASCII mode
559 if (format == STLReader::FormatBinary) {
560 break;
561 }
562 }
563
564 // End reading
565 readerError = reader.readEnd();
566 if (readerError != 0) {
567 return readerError;
568 }
569
570 return 0;
571}
572
583int SurfUnstructured::exportSTL(const std::string &filename, bool isBinary)
584{
585 return exportSTLSingle(filename, isBinary);
586}
587
601int SurfUnstructured::exportSTL(const std::string &filename, bool isBinary, bool isMulti,
602 std::unordered_map<int, std::string> *PIDNames)
603{
604 int flag = 0;
605 if (isMulti) {
606 flag = exportSTLMulti(filename, PIDNames);
607 } else {
608 flag = exportSTLSingle(filename, isBinary);
609 }
610
611 return flag;
612}
613
614//TODO: normals??
615//TODO: error flag on output
616//TODO: conversion of quad into tria
626int SurfUnstructured::exportSTLSingle(const std::string &filename, bool isBinary)
627{
628 int writerError;
629
630 // Initialize writer
631 STLReader::Format format;
632 if (isBinary) {
633 format = STLReader::FormatBinary;
634 } else {
635 format = STLReader::FormatASCII;
636 }
637
638 STLWriter writer(filename, format);
639
640 // Solid name
641 //
642 // An empty solid name will be used.
643 const std::string name = "";
644
645 // Detect if this is the master writer
646 bool isMasterWriter;
647#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
648 if (isPartitioned()) {
649 isMasterWriter = (getRank() == 0);
650 } else {
651#else
652 {
653#endif
654 isMasterWriter = true;
655 }
656
657 // Detect if the file will be written incrementally
658 bool incrementalWrite;
659#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
660 incrementalWrite = true;
661#else
662 incrementalWrite = false;
663#endif
664
665 // Count the number of facets
666 long nFacets = getInternalCellCount();
667#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
668 if (isPartitioned()) {
669 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &nFacets, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_SUM, getCommunicator());
670 }
671#endif
672
673 // Write header
674 if (isMasterWriter) {
675 // Begin writing
676 writerError = writer.writeBegin(STLWriter::WriteOverwrite, incrementalWrite);
677 if (writerError != 0) {
678 writer.writeEnd();
679
680 return writerError;
681 }
682
683 // Write header section
684 writerError = writer.writeHeader(name, nFacets);
685 if (writerError != 0) {
686 writer.writeEnd();
687
688 return writerError;
689 }
690
691#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
692 // Close the file to let other process write into it
693 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
694 if (writerError != 0) {
695 return writerError;
696 }
697#endif
698 }
699
700 // Write facet data
701#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
702 int nRanks = getProcessorCount();
703 for (int i = 0; i < nRanks; ++i) {
704 if (i == getRank()) {
705 // Begin writing
706 writerError = writer.writeBegin(STLWriter::WriteAppend, incrementalWrite);
707 if (writerError != 0) {
708 writer.writeEnd();
709 return writerError;
710 }
711
712#else
713 {
714#endif
715 // Write facet section
716 CellConstIterator cellBegin = internalCellConstBegin();
717 CellConstIterator cellEnd = internalCellConstEnd();
718 for (CellConstIterator cellItr = cellBegin; cellItr != cellEnd; ++cellItr) {
719 // Get cell
720 const Cell &cell = *cellItr;
721
722 // Get vertex coordinates
723 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
724 assert(cellVertexIds.size() == 3);
725
726 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_0 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[0]).getCoords();
727 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_1 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[1]).getCoords();
728 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_2 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[2]).getCoords();
729
730 // Evaluate normal
731 const std::array<double, 3> normal = evalFacetNormal(cell.getId());
732
733 // Write data
734 writerError = writer.writeFacet(coords_0, coords_1, coords_2, normal);
735 if (writerError != 0) {
736 writer.writeEnd();
737 return writerError;
738 }
739 }
740
741#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
742 // Close the file to let other process write into it
743 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
744 if (writerError != 0) {
745 return writerError;
746 }
747 }
748
749 if (isPartitioned()) {
750 MPI_Barrier(getCommunicator());
751 }
752#endif
753 }
754
755 // Write footer
756 if (isMasterWriter) {
757#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
758 // Begin writning
759 //
760 // The file was previously closed to let other process write into it.
761 writerError = writer.writeBegin(STLWriter::WriteAppend, incrementalWrite);
762 if (writerError != 0) {
763 writer.writeEnd();
764 return writerError;
765 }
766#endif
767
768 // Write footer section
769 writerError = writer.writeFooter(name);
770 if (writerError != 0) {
771 writer.writeEnd();
772
773 return writerError;
774 }
775
776 // End writing
777 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
778 if (writerError != 0) {
779 return writerError;
780 }
781 }
782
783 return 0;
784}
785
796int SurfUnstructured::exportSTLMulti(const std::string &filename, std::unordered_map<int, std::string> *PIDNames)
797{
798 int writerError;
799
800 // Initialize writer
801 STLWriter writer(filename, STLReader::FormatASCII);
802
803 // Detect if this is the master writer
804 bool isMasterWriter;
805#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
806 if (isPartitioned()) {
807 isMasterWriter = (getRank() == 0);
808 } else {
809#else
810 {
811#endif
812 isMasterWriter = true;
813 }
814
815 // Detect if the file will be written incrementally
816 bool incrementalWrite = true;
817
818#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
819 // Count number of ranks
820 int nRanks = getProcessorCount();
821#endif
822
823 // Get the global list of PID
824 std::set<int> cellPIDs;
825#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
826 if (isPartitioned()) {
827 std::set<int> internalPIDs = getInternalCellPIDs();
828 std::vector<int> localPIDs(internalPIDs.begin(), internalPIDs.end());
829 int nLocalPids = localPIDs.size();
830
831 std::vector<int> gatherPIDCount(nRanks);
832 MPI_Allgather(&nLocalPids, 1, MPI_INT, gatherPIDCount.data(), 1, MPI_INT, getCommunicator());
833
834 std::vector<int> gatherPIDDispls(nRanks, 0);
835 for (int i = 1; i < nRanks; ++i) {
836 gatherPIDDispls[i] = gatherPIDDispls[i - 1] + gatherPIDCount[i - 1];
837 }
838
839 int gatherPIDsSize = gatherPIDDispls.back() + gatherPIDCount.back();
840
841 std::vector<int> globalPIDs(gatherPIDsSize);
842 MPI_Allgatherv(localPIDs.data(), nLocalPids, MPI_INT, globalPIDs.data(),
843 gatherPIDCount.data(), gatherPIDDispls.data(), MPI_INT, getCommunicator());
844
845 cellPIDs = std::set<int>(globalPIDs.begin(), globalPIDs.end());
846 } else {
847#else
848 {
849#endif
850 cellPIDs = getInternalCellPIDs();
851 }
852
853 // Export cells
854 bool firstPID = true;
855 for (int pid : cellPIDs) {
856 // Cells associated with the PID
857 std::vector<long> cells = getInternalCellsByPID(pid);
858
859 // Count the number of facets
860 long nFacets = cells.size();
861#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
862 if (isPartitioned()) {
863 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &nFacets, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_SUM, getCommunicator());
864 }
865#endif
866
867 // Solid name
868 std::string name;
869 if (PIDNames && PIDNames->count(pid) > 0) {
870 name = PIDNames->at(pid);
871 } else {
872 name = std::to_string(pid);
873 }
874
875 // Write header
876 if (isMasterWriter) {
877 // Begin writing
878 STLWriter::WriteMode writeMode;
879 if (firstPID) {
880 writeMode = STLWriter::WriteOverwrite;
881 } else {
882 writeMode = STLWriter::WriteAppend;
883 }
884
885 writerError = writer.writeBegin(writeMode, incrementalWrite);
886 if (writerError != 0) {
887 writer.writeEnd();
888
889 return writerError;
890 }
891
892 // Write header section
893 writerError = writer.writeHeader(name, nFacets);
894 if (writerError != 0) {
895 writer.writeEnd();
896
897 return writerError;
898 }
899
900#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
901 // Close the file to let other process write into it
902 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
903 if (writerError != 0) {
904 return writerError;
905 }
906#endif
907 }
908
909 // Write facet data
910#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
911 for (int i = 0; i < nRanks; ++i) {
912 if (i == getRank()) {
913 // Begin writing
914 writerError = writer.writeBegin(STLWriter::WriteAppend, incrementalWrite);
915 if (writerError != 0) {
916 writer.writeEnd();
917 return writerError;
918 }
919
920#else
921 {
922#endif
923 // Write facet section
924 for (long cellId : cells) {
925 // Get cell
926 const Cell &cell = getCell(cellId);
927
928 // Get vertex coordinates
929 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
930 assert(cellVertexIds.size() == 3);
931
932 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_0 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[0]).getCoords();
933 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_1 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[1]).getCoords();
934 const std::array<double, 3> &coords_2 = getVertex(cellVertexIds[2]).getCoords();
935
936 // Evaluate normal
937 const std::array<double, 3> normal = evalFacetNormal(cell.getId());
938
939 // Write data
940 writerError = writer.writeFacet(coords_0, coords_1, coords_2, normal);
941 if (writerError != 0) {
942 writer.writeEnd();
943 return writerError;
944 }
945 }
946
947 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
948 // Close the file to let other process write into it
949 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
950 if (writerError != 0) {
951 return writerError;
952 }
953 }
954
955 if (isPartitioned()) {
956 MPI_Barrier(getCommunicator());
957 }
958#endif
959 }
960
961 // Write footer
962 if (isMasterWriter) {
963#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
964 // Begin writing
965 //
966 // The file was previously closed to let other process write into it.
967 writerError = writer.writeBegin(STLWriter::WriteAppend, incrementalWrite);
968 if (writerError != 0) {
969 writer.writeEnd();
970 return writerError;
971 }
972#endif
973
974 // Write footer section
975 writerError = writer.writeFooter(name);
976 if (writerError != 0) {
977 writer.writeEnd();
978
979 return writerError;
980 }
981
982 // End writing
983 writerError = writer.writeEnd();
984 if (writerError != 0) {
985 return writerError;
986 }
987 }
988
989 // The first PID has been written
990 firstPID = false;
991 }
992
993 return 0;
994}
995
1013int SurfUnstructured::importDGF(const std::string &filename, int PIDOffset, bool PIDSquash)
1014{
1015 return importDGF(filename, false, PIDOffset, PIDSquash);
1016}
1017
1043int SurfUnstructured::importDGF(const std::string &filename, bool joinFacets, int PIDOffset, bool PIDSquash)
1044{
1045 // ====================================================================== //
1046 // VARIABLES DECLARATION //
1047 // ====================================================================== //
1048
1049 // Local variables
1050 DGFObj dgf_in(filename);
1051 int nV = 0, nS = 0;
1052 std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> vertex_list;
1053 std::vector<std::vector<int>> simplex_list;
1054 std::vector<int> simplex_PID;
1055 std::vector<long> vertex_map;
1056 std::vector<long> connect;
1057
1058 // Counters
1059 std::vector<std::vector<int>>::iterator c_, ce_;
1060 std::vector<int>::iterator i_, ie_;
1061 std::vector<long>::iterator j_, je_;
1062
1063 // ====================================================================== //
1064 // IMPORT DATA //
1065 // ====================================================================== //
1066
1067 // Read vertices and cells from DGF file
1068 dgf_in.load(nV, nS, vertex_list, simplex_list, simplex_PID);
1069
1070 // Add vertices
1071 vertex_map.resize(nV);
1072 if (joinFacets) {
1073 // Vertices added to the patch are also added into a cache. Before
1074 // inserting a new vertex, the cache is checked: if a vertex with the
1075 // same coordinates is already in the cache, the new vertex will not
1076 // be added and the existing one will be used.
1077 //
1078 // The cache contains the position of the vertices in the list of
1079 // vertices read from the DGF file.
1080 Vertex::Less vertexLess(10 * std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon());
1081
1082 auto vertexCoordsLess = [&vertexLess, &vertex_list](const int &i, const int &j)
1083 {
1084 return vertexLess(vertex_list[i], vertex_list[j]);
1085 };
1086
1087 std::set<int, decltype(vertexCoordsLess)> vertexCache(vertexCoordsLess);
1088
1089 for (int i = 0; i < nV; ++i) {
1090 long vertexId;
1091 auto vertexCacheItr = vertexCache.find(i);
1092 if (vertexCacheItr == vertexCache.end()) {
1093 VertexIterator vertexItr = addVertex(vertex_list[i]);
1094 vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
1095 vertexCache.insert(i);
1096 } else {
1097 vertexId = vertex_map[*vertexCacheItr];
1098 }
1099 vertex_map[i] = vertexId;
1100 }
1101 } else {
1102 for (int i = 0; i < nV; ++i) {
1103 VertexIterator vertexItr = addVertex(vertex_list[i]);
1104 long vertexId = vertexItr.getId();
1105 vertex_map[i] = vertexId;
1106 }
1107 }
1108
1109 // Update connectivity infos
1110 ce_ = simplex_list.end();
1111 for (c_ = simplex_list.begin(); c_ != ce_; ++c_) {
1112 ie_ = c_->end();
1113 for (i_ = c_->begin(); i_ != ie_; ++i_) {
1114 *i_ = vertex_map[*i_];
1115 } //next i_
1116 } //next c_
1117
1118 // Add cells
1119 int k;
1120 for (c_ = simplex_list.begin(), k = 0; c_ != ce_; ++c_, ++k) {
1121 // Create cell
1122 i_ = c_->begin();
1123 connect.resize(c_->size(), Vertex::NULL_ID);
1124 je_ = connect.end();
1125 for (j_ = connect.begin(); j_ != je_; ++j_) {
1126 *j_ = *i_;
1127 ++i_;
1128 } //next j_
1129 CellIterator cellIterator = addCell(getDGFFacetType(c_->size()), connect);
1130
1131 // Set cell PID
1132 int cellPID = PIDOffset;
1133 if (!PIDSquash) {
1134 cellPID += simplex_PID[k];
1135 }
1136
1137 cellIterator->setPID(cellPID);
1138 } //next c_
1139
1140 return 0;
1141}
1142
1150int SurfUnstructured::exportDGF(const std::string &filename)
1151{
1152 // ====================================================================== //
1153 // VARIABLES DECLARATION //
1154 // ====================================================================== //
1155
1156 // Local variables
1157 DGFObj dgf_in(filename);
1158 int nV = getVertexCount(), nS = getCellCount();
1159 int v, nv;
1160 long vcount, ccount, idx;
1161 std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> vertex_list(nV);
1162 std::vector<std::vector<int>> simplex_list(nS);
1163 std::unordered_map<long, long> vertex_map;
1164
1165 // Counters
1166 VertexIterator v_, ve_;
1167 CellIterator c_, ce_;
1168
1169 // ====================================================================== //
1170 // EXPORT DATA //
1171 // ====================================================================== //
1172
1173 // Create vertex list
1174 ve_ = vertexEnd();
1175 vcount = 0;
1176 for (v_ = vertexBegin(); v_ != ve_; ++v_) {
1177 idx = v_->getId();
1178 vertex_list[vcount] = v_->getCoords();
1179 vertex_map[idx] = vcount;
1180 ++vcount;
1181 } //next v_
1182
1183 // Add cells
1184 ce_ = cellEnd();
1185 ccount = 0;
1186 for (c_ = cellBegin(); c_ != ce_; ++c_) {
1187 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = c_->getVertexIds();
1188 nv = cellVertexIds.size();
1189 simplex_list[ccount].resize(nv);
1190 for (v = 0; v < nv; ++v) {
1191 simplex_list[ccount][v] = vertex_map[cellVertexIds[v]];
1192 } //next v
1193 ++ccount;
1194 } //next c_
1195
1196 // Read vertices and cells from DGF file
1197 dgf_in.save(nV, nS, vertex_list, simplex_list);
1198
1199 return 0;
1200}
1201
1209ElementType SurfUnstructured::getDGFFacetType(int nFacetVertices)
1210{
1211 switch(nFacetVertices) {
1212
1213 case 1:
1214 return ElementType::VERTEX;
1215
1216 case 2:
1217 return ElementType::LINE;
1218
1219 case 3:
1220 return ElementType::TRIANGLE;
1221
1222 case 4:
1223 return ElementType::QUAD;
1224
1225 default:
1226 return ElementType::UNDEFINED;
1227
1228 }
1229}
1230
1231}
